Blog.post: today was a great day..went shopping with my friends..so cool.today is the great singapore sale..hahaha..em bot alot of clothes..but i didnt buy any..haha..too tired to try on coz my eyes were half closed..slept at almost 3am the nite b4..trying to finish my econs essay which was unsuccessful..we shopped till about 6 when i'm suppose to meet sam..went to lau pa sat to eat dinner..so long nv go there already..then walk walk around fullerton and esplanade..started raining..almost drenched..haha..shopped at raffles city at around 8 plus when sam decided to go home to study her physics test..no taxi around so i accompanied sam home then take a taxi from there..wad a good fren am i rite..haha..reach home so tired already...but had to finish my econs essay which was half done..so sian..called sam up to teach me..found out she was too tired to study her test..haha..taught her how to copy from others..so farni..she say the teacher dun allow..which teacher will allow students to copy..sam damn farni leh..anywae tmr got to go school school so early..argh..holiday like no holiday like that.. terrible!!!

econs sux!!!!! now is 2.20am in the morning and i'm still doing my econs essay..really dunno how to do lor..wah lau..cant write anything leh..the notes oso nv teach this part..tmr muz hand up somemore..last day of school already still want to torture us..cruel ppl!!!

juz finish school..waiting for sam to finish her meeting so decided to come to the library and blog for awhile..haha..found daniel using the com..he is doing his chinese project now..aiyo..keep dunno the hanyu pinyin and asking me..haha..oops hope he doesnt look at my com.the day was as usual.. again i have kbox lesson and she always make us have heart attack..today suppose to have soccer finals at the national stadium..but dun tink i'll be going la..have chinese test tmr..have to learn 124 chinese idioms n proverbs..argh..so difficult lor..i tink i'm going to fail my test tmr.. but no big deal actually..i have been failing ever since i come to sa..haha ok muz buck up!!!beta see wad's daniel doing now..lalalala

now in school..having break now..everybody can go home already except us..wah lau..got to stay back for kbox lesson..so sianz!!i'm definitely going to watch "the day after tomorrow" man..so nice the show..cant wait for this week to end..yay!!ok now sitting near someone irritating..he's a super super dislikable person.. sometime try to act cute sometime try to act cool..please lor..grow up!!

today super rush man..i nv do any hw at all during the weekends and when i reach school today suddenly got so many hw muz hand in..wah lau..every break i have to rush to copy hw la..no time to rest oso..so damn tired..den somemore dat kbox come back after so long den suddenly very angry wif us..wad the..la..we oso nv do anything wrong..wad's her prob man..then all of a sudden wan us to hand up lit essay..cant stand her..make me rush thru her hw and cannot pay attention in class..all her fault..then tmr goin to get it from her again..wah lau..the more i tink the more angry i am..tmr suppose to be half day la..and she wan to use 4periods for lit make up..we want to watch movie one lor..stupid woman.come back for wad..so irritating..then go music lesson oso kena scolding for composing a super monotaneous melody for my lyrics composition..oh wad a bad day!!

sunday!!! didnt go church..too tired la..reach home late last nite..kena scoldin from my dad coz he say i waste my time outside and when i reach home i'm tired to study..haha..actually quite true la.study 4 pages of econs and my eyes want to close already.yest went out wif sam for lunch..then we went shopping.found out that samuel and kevin sells nice clothes.haha..then went city hall..wanting to eat dinner..but we couldnt find anywhere nice to eat.so we decided to go to esplanade..anywae beta go do some studyin now..

busy day today!!! morning went to cheer the bowling team then went back to school for lessons..after that went queensway shopping centre to shop for joel's soccer shoes..after that went to eat and lastly went to watch the chinese drama "yang guang you miao"..haha..the drama is not bad though..but i almost slept off in the middle la..haha..after the drama actually want to go town..but carol joyce and bryan said it was too late..argh..so boring to come home so early..hehe..but i accompanied joyce to serangoon and then take a cab home..haha..cool rite..wad a nice friend am i..keke..anywae tired now...............

i'm tired!!but rather happy today too..coz i learnt a few tricks to trick others..hahaha..although kena tricked many times oso la..i even got tricked by how the trick can trick others..oh mine..stupid la..some ppl still can tell me blink two times to the other person or wadever crap.wah lau..i still believe canz..oh i'm juz too gullible.ok i dun care..tmr i muz find out the reasons behind those "black magic"!!!hehe..yay!!today got no hw..very good..but i tink still muz study econs..coz tmr maybe going to watch movie and stuff..sure going to come back late again like today and yest.lalalala..

today isnt a really good day..hmm..was pretty tired..looked super unfriendly and antisocial. juz came back from the freaking piano lesson and got a good scolding frm my beloved teacher for not doing my theory hw.school wasnt good as well.hmm..found out that i did my lit essay for nothing coz i'm not suppose to hand it in and now i still have to redo it coz i realised 99% of the essay is crap.then sold pillows today for the who dares win competition too..the business was ok la..didnt make much profit though..hmm..wad else..life is still the same..oh yeah..saw TL today..he cut his hair!!haha..looked like he is entering NS or something.but he still looks cute.tokin bout TL..ppl are asking me who he is.muz be after reading my blog la...haha.dun bother asking coz u most prolly wun noe him.anywae time to go..cya!

argh...tis is so so horrible..have to hand up this stupid lit essay on antony and cleopatra tmr and i cant tink of wad to write..trying to find sources from the internet but i cant find anything..anywae juz went to TL friendster today..hmm..found out he likes westlife..haha...he doesnt look like wad he wrote about himself..well..at least a step closer to noeing him beta. can figure out he shuld be quite a smart guy..esp when he's in a class with 6,7 pointers..whoa..tt's like about my points divide by 2..haha.hmm..was wondering y i didnt say hi and acted as though i didnt noe him!!argh..really regretted my actions..juz a few days differences and we behave like we dunno each other..oh man..tis is bad..anywae shall carry on with my lit..nitez

yay!! at last i created my own blog with the help from my brother spongepop!!haha..let me see wad he helped me with.. hmmm.. my display name, my blog title, my blog address and my blog template!!haha.. almost everything la..although he keep giving me stupid names for my display name and make me want to kick his arse!haha..and....keeps saying that pink is girlie.. pink is the perfect colour for princess me!!haha..ok anywae i will end here so that i can invite my dear brother to my blog!! :p

today had geog and math paper..the geog was damn tiring.. got 6 data response qn..2hrs..not enuff time lor..i write until i want to die..so tiring!! wanted to fall asleep already..then after that got math somemore.. damn sick! i sit front row somemore..actually i quite relax la..although 98% of the paper i dunno how to do...haha..maybe coz i noe i'm going to fail anywae.. was thinking of handing up blank paper..but i tink i'm quite happy..coz i counted..should have around 5/100..haha..not bad..did finish the paper in 1 hr.. then i started drawing crap on my qn paper.. the teacher still think i quite gd..got alot of things to write..haha.wait till she mark my paper..hope she dun freak out..quite relax in the afternoon..coz tmr got lit paper..but is unseen..and sure fail oso..kbox nv pass ppl one la.. so dun need to study..yay!!=D
isnt wad i wrote juz now cool...taken from someone's blog..haha...sound scary anot..the person that someone wrote about muz be really bad..hmmm..=p

why did u become like that?! is it worth while? u are not the person i once know..and i dun understand y will such little things change u so much.but i guess no one will ever find out the answer. and i dunno when to trustu and when not to. wadever u say cannot be 100% correct.u hav made ur frens disappointed..u have made ur true friends become suspicious of u..once again, is it worth while?

Notice me Take my hand Why are we In strangers land? Our love was strong Why carry on without me? CHORUS Everytime I try to fly I fall Without my wings I feel so small I guess I need you, baby And everytime I see you in my dreams I see your face; it's haunting me I guess I need you, baby. I'll make believe That you are here It's the only way I see clear What have I done? You seem to move on easy chorus I may have made it rain Please forgive me My weakness caused you pain And this song is my sorry At night I pray That soon your face will fade away chorus

argh...i miss my little dragon..heard it went for the famine camp..i shuld have gone la..haha..might be in the same group as it..30 hours together with it..oh...cant imagine..i tink i wun even feel hungry la..haha..
my com is failing....irritating!!!stupid virus la...first its my e-mail having problems..now is my msn..have to use the school com to delete my mails....so ma fan!!

bored bored bored!! i dun want to study for my common test!! i hate books!!not books, lecture notes!! we have no books..but we have piles and i mean PILES of lecture notes to stuff it into our tiny brains..poor souls!!!!!
urlLink the red moon..haha..taken in desaru..cool rite? urlLink
after one week of intense camps, i'm finally back in my cosy house and my favourite computer!!oh and i had nv thought that my bed was so comfortable..
tmr my mummy's bdae! yay..eating seoul garden with my relatives...hmm..suppose to get her a bdae prezzie..but too busy..i tink i beta get her one tmr..hehe..

juz got scolded by daddy..oh my...damn irritating..does he have other things to scold besides my studies?ok..suppose to do my lit hw now..which is due on thur..but shall do it today coz tmr will be a busy day..hmmm..."wad may be the thoughts and feelings of an audience as the following sequence unfolds?"..haiz..how come the question so chim....aiyo..ok..i shall have to get some xtra notes online..oh is that plagerism? today damn shiok..had about 8 to 9 breaks...haha...no GP, no geog, no lit!!slacking all the way..all the slackers of the world unite!:p
bitch

went for bbq tonite..but the fire was only up after 1 and a half hours after the bbq started..used thousands of fire starters..used some of my outdoor cooking skills and finally the last resort..newspaper! the fire was huge..but it didnt last..like we dunno like that..newspaper fire can nv last..returned to the old way..blowing and fanning..used finish a whole box of starters..had to go out and get another new box..i was too tired..so i went to sit and slack around..b4 i knew it..the fire was up..hooray!

using the school's com to blog! haven been blogging for years..my own com is going bonkers.i tink that stupid virus is multiplying..and its causing my internet to malfunction..damn it..shall have to repair it as soon as possible! i'm so sick of all the error messages poping out at me..so irritatin can..anywae have been studying in school in the late afternoons these few days..dun want to go home...i'm trying to go home as late as i can..anywae studying in school is not a bad idea..coz i noe that when i reach home..i will either be infront of my com chatting or sleeping..hahaha..parents meeting next friday..its friday the 13th..cool~ i guess i noe wad the teacher or whoever will be telling my parents..haha..poor results! dunno y i'm not the least afraid of the teachers meeting my parents..maybe coz i dun even care wad my parents will think or do to me..kind of got numb to their scoldings and stuff..and i tink i'm old enuff to think for myself..its so stupid la..meeting ur parents to complain..i find it so yucks..treating me like a secondary school kid..do u tink it will be of much use? no~..call me a rebellious kid..i dun care..one tips to my friends..stop being so paranoid about parents meetin..grow up!! haha..=p
